sourcesContent:
import {
    POST_LIST_REQUEST,
    POST_LIST_SUCCESS,
    POST_LIST_FAIL,

    POST_DETAILS_REQUEST,
    POST_DETAILS_SUCCESS,
    POST_DETAILS_FAIL,

    POST_DELETE_REQUEST,
    POST_DELETE_SUCCESS,
    POST_DELETE_FAIL,

    POST_CREATE_REQUEST,
    POST_CREATE_SUCCESS,
    POST_CREATE_FAIL,

    POST_UPDATE_REQUEST,
    POST_UPDATE_SUCCESS,
    POST_UPDATE_FAIL,

    POST_CREATE_REVIEW_REQUEST,
    POST_CREATE_REVIEW_SUCCESS,
    POST_CREATE_REVIEW_FAIL,  
   
    POST_TOP_REQUEST,
    POST_TOP_SUCCESS,
    POST_TOP_FAIL 
} from '../constants/postConstants'


export const postListReducer = (state = {posts: []}, action) => {


    switch (action.type) {
        case POST_LIST_REQUEST:
            return { loading:true, posts: []}

        case POST_LIST_SUCCESS:
            return { loading: false,
                      posts:action.payload}
        
        case POST_LIST_FAIL:
            return {loading: false, error: action.payload}
        
        default:
            return state
    }
}
